li.label: numbing cold
li.description: I can't stop shivering. My teeth are chattering. All I can think of is getting warm.

li.label: absolutely freezing
li.description: My teeth are chattering so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.

li.label: loving the cold
li.description: It's cold and I'm chilly, just how I like it!

li.label: sweaty
li.description: It's too hot here. I'm sweating.

li.label: hot
li.description: It's way too hot here. If I could just have a breath of cool air...

li.label: sweltering hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.

li.label: blistering hot
li.description: This place is searing hot. I think I could die from this heat!

li.label: loving the heat
li.description: It's hot and I'm sweaty, just how I like it!

li.label: darkness
li.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I really don't like it.
